member.name: T:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile
member.summary: describes the characteristics of a computing module and methodology for performing AES encryption.

member.name: T:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.AESMode
member.summary: defines the different modes in which the AES encryption can be performed.

member.name: F:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.AESMode.CTR
member.summary: Counter Mode.

member.name: F:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.AESMode.CBC
member.summary: Chained Block Cipher Mode.

member.name: F:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.AESMode.ECB
member.summary: Embedded Codeblock Mode.

member.name: T:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.AcceleratorType
member.summary: defines different types of AES accelerators that can be used.

member.name: F:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.AcceleratorType.None
member.summary: No accelerator is used.

member.name: F:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.AcceleratorType.CpuHardware
member.summary: CPU-provided Hardware acceleration is used.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.ProfileId
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this profile.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a free-form description of the conditions under which this experiment was performed or any other relevant details.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.Author
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the person who authored this entry.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.PlatformName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the computing platform or module.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.ProviderName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the AES implementation provider. For software implementations, this likely represents the library name. For hardware-accelerated implementations, this value is typically not used.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.PlatformAccelerator
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of AES Accelerator that is used on this platform.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.TestedAESMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the AES encryption mode that was tested under this profile.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.TestedAESBitLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the AES encryption key (in bits) that was tested under this profile.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.TotalTestedByteSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of bytes that were encrypted when profiling this platform.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.TotalTestedEnergyJoules
member.summary: Gets or sets the total number of joules that were consumed when profiling this platform.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.TotalTestTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the total runtime of the this profile when benchmarking this platform.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.TestedFrequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the processor frequency (in Hz) during the test profile when benchmarking this platform.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.AverageVoltage
member.summary: Gets or sets the average voltage (in Volts) used to power the device during the duration of the test.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.AverageCurrent
member.summary: Gets or sets the average current (in Amps) consumed by the platform during the duration of the test.

member.name: T:SchedulerDatabase.SchedulerContext
member.summary: provides a context for accessing the database of available profiles to use while scheduling a mission.

member.name: M:SchedulerDatabase.SchedulerContext.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: Provided for EF Core Migration generation.

member.name: M:SchedulerDatabase.SchedulerContext.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the database file to open.

member.name: P:SchedulerDatabase.SchedulerContext.AESProfiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the s stored in the database.

member.name: T:SchedulerDatabase.SchedulingSummarizer
member.summary: provides support for retreiving summarized test results from an underlying database accessed through a .

member.name: M:SchedulerDatabase.SchedulingSummarizer.#ctor(SchedulerDatabase.SchedulerContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:SchedulerDatabase.SchedulingSummarizer.GetAllTestAuthors
member.summary: Gets a listing of all the authors who have test results included in the database.

member.name: M:SchedulerDatabase.SchedulingSummarizer.GetAllTestedPlatforms
member.summary: Gets a listing of all the platforms which have test results included in the database.

member.name: M:SchedulerDatabase.SchedulingSummarizer.GetAllResultsForAccelerator(SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile.AcceleratorType)
member.summary: Gets a listing of test profiles for all experiments conducted using a specific accelerator device.
member.param: The specific accelerator type to query for.

member.name: M:SchedulerDatabase.SchedulingSummarizer.SummarizeResults(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{SchedulerDatabase.Models.AESEncyptorProfile})
member.summary: Computes summarized results for each unique test case provided in a collection of raw profiles.
member.returns: A collection of each unique test case present in the input, containing averaged results for each parameter.
